department.ch: 人力資源管理研究所碩士班

goal.ch: This course offers a combination of theoretical and practical frameworks to identify, examine, and comprehend how ethical decisions are made and how ethical issues are dealt with in the field of business. This class will utilize lectures, case analyses, and other materials such as videos, vignettes, and other digital media to challenge the students‘ ethical reasoning and decisions. Interactive learning techniques aim to enhance students’ learning motivation and experience that encourage critical thinking skills, impacting their perspectives and attitudes toward business ethics.
